ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(TEXT(Grid_Configuration_Type__c) == "Org Level Goal"), NOT(TEXT(Grid_Configuration_Type__c) == "Resource Role Level Goal"), NOT(TEXT(Grid_Configuration_Type__c) == "Resource Role Alert"), NOT(TEXT(Grid_Configuration_Type__c) == "Org Level Alert"), NOT(TEXT(Grid_Configuration_Type__c) == "Audio Podcast"), NOT(TEXT(Grid_Configuration_Type__c) == "Videocast"), OR( NOT(ISNULL(Goal_Start_Date__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Goal_End_Date__c)), NOT(ISBLANK( Resource_Role__c )) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please clear the Resource Role, Goal Start Date, Goal End Date those fields are allowed only for Org Level and Resource Role Level Types
